name: MIGHTY MOLE
description:
Mighty Mole is a simple PICO-8 platformer game I made for Ludum Dare 38 Jam.

Travel the world to save moles in distress.

Collisions are really glitchy (I'm too exhausted to make them good before the deadline 😅), but hopefully you'll like that small prototype.

Arrows to move Mighty Mole, X to dig, C or Up Arrow to jump.

Download the cartridge and load it in PICO-8, or play it on this very page… You can also find it on the Lexaloffle BBS
